duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct user research and deliver actionable insights for both generative and evaluative research to inform digital strategy and product development decisions.
Develop and maintain a research roadmap that aligns with product and UX priorities and reflects the most pressing needs of the business and its users.
Work with cross-functional teams to integrate research into agile development process and inform product and design decisions.
Identify common themes and areas of opportunity for future research and product development.
Communicate actionable insights in a clear and compelling way, relevant to business goals, project objectives, and user needs.
Establish goals, objectives, and benchmarks for improving the user experience, and measure the impact of design changes on user engagement, retention, and satisfaction.
Support the development and implementation of a democratized research program, and establish a process for reviewing and approving research studies.

education_certification.credential: BS, MS, or PHD in a research-related discipline (e.g., Human Computer Interaction, Interaction Design, Human Factors, Psychology, Anthropology, Cognitive Science)
